  org.codehaus.groovy.grails.test.support.GrailsTestTypeSupport
      nl.jworks.grails.plugin.fitnesse.testrunner.GrailsFitnesseTestType

class GrailsFitnesseTestType
extends org.codehaus.groovy.grails.test.support.GrailsTestTypeSupport

Class used by running 'grails test-app integration:fitnesse'. This TestType is registered using the _Events.groovy in the Grails eco system.
